1.title: Greatest Parents Ever
1.plot: Congratulations - you're going to be a parent! Now the bad news: kids don't come with an instruction manual. But don't worry - host Amanda Seales will give you all the tips you need to become the parent you wish you had.

2.title: Greatest Body Ever
2.plot: Muffin top? Beer belly? Junk in the trunk? Not if we can help it! Whether you're starting to sag or already drooping, host Amanda Seales has the eight steps to building that bangin' body you've been dreaming about.

3.title: Greatest Travelers Ever
3.plot: So you want to travel? Whether it's saving money on hotels, or just not embarrassing yourself in front of the locals, Amanda Seales will reveal the eight tips you need to become a world-class globetrotter.

4.title: Greatest Pranks Ever
4.plot: Pranks come in all shapes and sizes, and there's usually no way around them, until now. Host Amanda Seales lays down eight vital tips you need to avoid getting pranked by friends, family or even strangers on the street.

5.title: Greatest Conspiracy Theories Ever
5.plot: Amanda Seales dives into the most unbelievable legends, myths and mysteries, uncovering everything from undead celebs to what really happened to the Titanic...to the truly unexplainable: Kim Kardashian's derriere.

6.title: Greatest Surprises Ever
6.plot: There's nothing like a good surprise, but pulling one off is actually much trickier than it looks. Host Amanda Seales will reveal the essential surprise techniques that you can use on your unsuspecting friends and family.

7.title: Greatest Fans Ever
7.plot: You're not really a fan until the whole world knows how you feel. Good thing host Amanda Seales is here to reveal eight crucial tips for taking your fandom to the next level - whether it's painting your face or getting a tattoo!

8.title: Greatest Holidays Ever
8.plot: Host Amanda Seales teaches the seven key tips you need to make the most out of every single holiday, from Easter to Halloween. Learn how to decorate on the big day, dress for the occasion and feed your guests a big-ass meal.

9.title: Greatest Style Ever
9.plot: Host Amanda Seales reveals eight critical tips you need to have a killer look. So whether you're a future fashionista or someone who can't tell couture from a clearance rack, you're in for a complete style overhaul!

10.title: Greatest Night Ever
10.plot: The details of a perfect night out can often be hazy. How did we end up there? And how the heck did we get home? Thankfully, host Amanda Seales is here to make sense of it all with eight tips for having an amazing night out.

11.title: Greatest Viral Videos Ever
11.plot: Think you've got what it takes to go viral? Host Amanda Seales gives eight crucial tips to creating the ultimate viral video, and she'll use some of the biggest internet success stories of all time as inspiration.

12.title: Greatest Summer Ever
12.plot: Host Amanda Seales shows you everything you need to have the most fun under the sun. Whether you're hitting the beach, swimming in the lake or just chilling in the backyard, we'll help you beat the heat without breaking a sweat.

1.title: Greatest Products Ever
1.plot: From hiring the perfect pitchman, to inventing a problem no one has, host Amanda Seales teaches viewers clever tricks to move product like a boss.

2.title: Greatest Politicians Ever
2.plot: From passionate debating, to slinging that mud, host Amanda Seales serves up the eight techniques you'll need to become a political powerhouse.

3.title: Greatest Sports Ever
3.plot: Hey sports fans! Amanda Seales lays down 7 key rules to having an amazing sports experience. Whether you play, watch, or just like getting hammered in the parking lot, we've got a recipe for dominating sports like a pro.

4.title: Greatest Weddings Ever
4.plot: Weddings are a BIG deal. From memorable ceremonies, to over-the-top entrances, host Amanda Seales reveals 7 steps to making that big day incredible.

5.title: Greatest Animals Ever
5.plot: Host Amanda Seales shares eight critical tips on how to make an amazing viral video, starring animals! Time you cash in on the internet's biggest stars.

6.title: Greatest Newscasts Ever
6.plot: Amanda Seales shares 8 critical tips on how to produce an amazing newscast, from creating chemistry between anchors, to dealing with drunk hecklers!

7.title: Greatest Kids Ever
7.plot: Host Amanda Seales saves the day with the essential rules for parenting like a boss, from teaching kids respect to preserving their innocence to making sure they don't kill their younger siblings. Whether you have kids or plan to one day, we'll show you how to raise the perfect rugrat.

8.title: Greatest Parties Ever
8.plot: Host Amanda Seales teaches you the vital steps to throwing a bash your guests will never forget. From the most over-the-top extravagance to the insanity that is the dance floor, get ready to throw the blowout of the century.

9.title: Greatest Vacations Ever
9.plot: Host Amanda Seales gives viewers tips to vacationing. Learn how to maximize your beach time and what's the proper way to bring home those memories so they last a lifetime. Kick back and relax, you're on vacay now!

10.title: Greatest Performers Ever
10.plot: From intense practice to street performing to recovering from unavoidable stage blunders, host Amanda Seales shares tips for giving an unforgettable performance. Places, places everyone - it's showtime!

11.title: Greatest Food Ever
11.plot: Whether you're a Top Chef wannabe or just waiting to dig in, you'll never dislike a meal again, as host Amanda Seales serves up the tasty tips you need to broaden that palate, savor the flavor and celebrate the sweetness of food!

12.title: Greatest Internet Stars Ever
12.plot: Host Amanda Seales reveals what you need to go more viral than a cat playing trombone. From hilarious tutorial videos to internet-breaking rants, you'll be fully prepped to rake in those likes and rack up those views.

13.title: Greatest Relationships Ever
13.plot: Finding your true love can sometimes feel like a full-time job. But don't worry, we've got you covered! Host Amanda Seales breaks down the key steps to landing - and keeping - the person of your dreams.

14.title: Greatest Life Ever
14.plot: Whether it's finding a job you love, spending quality time with the fam, or just seeing the world, host/life coach Amanda Seales will share the golden rules you need to make the most out of your ride on this planet we call Earth.

15.title: Greatest Pets Ever
15.plot: Amanda Seales reveals the best tips for getting the most from - and giving the most to - your non-human family members. Whether they're furry or feathered, scaled or scary, you'll learn how to make your pet the best on the block.

16.title: Greatest College Ever
16.plot: From dominating dorm life to boosting school pride to making sure your graduation is unforgettable, host Amanda Seales teaches that sometimes you just need to put down the books and have the time of your life!

imdb.plot outline: Hosted by comedian Amanda Seales, Greatest Ever is a fast-paced, informative and fun pop-culture comedy countdown show that takes viewers through the "do's" and "don'ts" of topics like weddings, animal videos, sports, politicians and awesomely, unintentionally funny inventions, infomercials and products.
imdb.title: Greatest Ever
plot: Hosted by comedian Amanda Seales, _Greatest Ever_ (qv) is a fast-paced, informative and fun pop-culture comedy countdown show that takes viewers through the "do's" and "don'ts" of topics like weddings, animal videos, sports, politicians and awesomely, unintentionally funny inventions, infomercials and products.
